title: FFS Scar Story
author: stepoutandlive
selftext: Today at work my coworker noticed my hairline scar from FFS. He asked how I got it, and I awkwardly joked that it was from brain surgery. He asked if it was cancer or a skateboarding accident, and I realized I have no “go-to” story for curious people, and maybe I need one. What do you all tell people about your hairline scar if they see it? Do you go with something funny, honest, or make up an epic tale? Would love to hear some suggestions

comments.author: be_transcendent
comments.body: “I don’t really like talking about it”

comments.author: OnceMoreATerrapin
comments.body: I say I had a lobotomy. Lol

comments.author: __sophie_hart__
comments.body: Face lift, plenty of women get them.
